channel.title: CPH:PNDORA on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in CPH:PNDORA on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Pandora CEO Warns US Consumers ‘Will Foot the Bill’ for Tariffs
item.description: Danish jewelry company Pandora A/S is weighing potential price increases in the US and elsewhere due to higher tariffs imposed by President Donald Trump, according to its chief executive officer.

item.title: Pandora CEO Warns US Consumers ‘Will Foot the Bill’ for Tariffs
item.description: Danish jewelry company Pandora A/S is weighing potential price increases in the US and elsewhere due to higher tariffs imposed by President Donald Trump, according to its chief executive officer.

item.title: Pandora Slides as Jewelry Company Warns of Weak Sales in Europe
item.description: Pandora A/S shares slumped the most since April after the Danish jewelry maker warned of weak demand in Europe and uncertainty over tariffs.

item.title: Pandora Slides as Jewelry Company Warns of Weak Sales in Europe
item.description: Pandora A/S shares slumped the most since April after the Danish jewelry maker warned of weak demand in Europe and uncertainty over tariffs.
